books.title: Legends & Lattes
books.author: Travis Baldree
books.review: A warm and cozy fantasy about opening a coffee shop. Perfect for rainy afternoons when you want low stakes comfort.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.review:
## A delightful return to hard sci-fi

Andy Weir is at his best when he strands a scientist in an impossible situation. *Project Hail Mary* doubles down on that formula with earnest characters, clever problem solving, and a surprisingly heartfelt friendship.

- Lots of crunchy science without getting bogged down.
- The pacing never lets up even on a re-read.
- The ending left me grinning for days.

books.title: The Future Is Analog
books.author: David Sax
books.review: Currently reading. So far it's a thoughtful look at the human side of digital transformation.

books.title: The Murderbot Diaries
books.author: Martha Wells
books.review: On the wishlist after hearing rave reviews from friends who love sarcastic protagonists.
